name: 2019 3rd International Symposium on Aviation and Aerospace System Engineering
content: 2019 3rd International Symposium on Aviation and Aerospace System Engineering (SAASE 2019) 24-26, May, 2019./Shanghai, China Web: http://www.saase.org/ 2019 3rd International Symposium on Aviation and Aerospace System Engineering (SAASE 2019). SAASE 2019 is organized by Hong Kong Society of Mechanical Engineers( HKSME). The conference will be held in Shanghai, China, from 24-26, May, 2019! The conference is an international symposium for the presentation of technological advances and research results in the fields of Aviation and Aerospace System Engineering. The conference will bring together leading researchers, engineers and scientists in the domain of interest from around the world. We warmly welcome prospected authors submit your new research papers to SAASE 2019, and share the valuable experiences with the scientist and scholars around the world. ●Publication Information Author can submit full paper to publish in the volume of Conference Proceeding , which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS), Inspec, and other indexing organizations. ●Topics(for more topics: http://www.saase.org/author.html) Advanced theoretical models Advances in aerospace technology Aeroelasticity and loads Aerodynamic’s fundamental concepts Aerospace robotics and mechatronics Flight software engineering and testing Aerostructures and composites Aircraft Navigation Antennas ●Paper Submission Submission Email:saase@smehk.org Submission System: https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/SAASE2019 ●Call for participants 1,Presenter:If you are interested in giving presentation on conference, without publishing your paper in the proceeding, you need to submit the abstract and title of your presentation to us:saase@smehk.org 2,Listener: If you are interested in attending the conference to participant this international symposium on Aviation and Aerospace System Engineering, you are welcome to attend SAASE 2019! 3,Reviewer:Experts in the area of Aeronautical Materials, Aerospace Engineering are welcome to join the conference as reviewer. Send your CV to: saase@smehk.org ●Contact Us Ms. Linda Lee Email: saase@smehk.org Tel:+852-30697937( Hong Kong) Web: http://www.saase.org/
